column5: Creates a simulacrum of Ifrit, Lord of the Inferno, based off the wielder's memories of past encounters with the primal.
Creates a simulacrum of Titan, Lord of Crags, based off the wielder's memories of past encounters with the primal.
Creates a simulacrum of Garuda, Lady of the Vortex, based off the wielder's memories of past encounters with the primal.
Creates a simulacrum of Odin based off the wielder's memories of past encounters with the elder primal.
Juniper incense burned by the deceased in accordance with First Light funereal practices. Summons the faerie king to sentence all foes to death.
